name: QuickItalian
0:
”Alexa, open Quick Italian”
”Alexa, start Quick Italian”
”Alexa, run Quick Italian”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: quick italian
des: Want to practice your Italian? Need a quick translation? This skill is simple, fast and can translate entire phrases! Just open the skill, speak a word or phrase in English, and Alexa will say it back to you in Italian. It's easy and quick! A no-nonsense way to settle a bet, romance someone, or practice Italian! Translated by Google.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
